title: ADCS ARE PLAYED IN EVERY LANE AND IM DONE PLAYING

replies.body: i think the real issue is that nobody else can go in any lane..

Yeah. I'm fine with ADC Top. I mean, I'm not fine fine, I still curse and die a little inside every time I have to lane against a good Vayne, but I'm fine. But why can't I play my Juggernauts and Skirmishers in Botlane? Or my Mages in Jungle? I want some flexibility too!

Well you can. Heimer jungle, diana jungle, malzar jungle. You can play your mages botlane as well. And most of the toplaners can be played jungle, most of the mid can be played top (yet subefficiently since the mid role is often to roam a lot), you can play most of the fighters on the midlane as  well (irelia/panth ... )

Natural counter to juggernauts are ADCs so, it might not be a good idea to play them botlane, but a pantheon +  melee botlane is quite viable.

Synergy is the key word here. I've had a lot of fun with double burst mage/assassin botlane. Everytime our ult is up we would straight up OS the ADC then kill the support quite easily. (IE : Annie + veigar, veigar + Zed ..., syndra + veigar)

play with 4 friends in flex and try new meta, yet put some reflexion in it, you'll see it works quite well.
Jungle annie will be the new meta.

I remember when Soraka Top became popular and she was FULLY REWORKED because "you shouldn't play this champ in other roles hurr durr". 

Then you see ADCs in every single role of the game, performing better than mages in midlane and better than tanks in toplane, and Riot doesn't see any problem. Favoritism? Noooo, it must be our imagination...

Janna mid literally just press Q to instantly clear a minion wave from a distance your opponent couldn't do anything about, all while having movement speed and a shield for added safety, then transitioned into giving your carries ridiculously huge shields to make them unkillable.

Soraka mid / top pressed Q and won the lane. No, seriously, she pushed to tower while wearing down her lane opponent, and was nigh-unkillable due to how good her self-healing was. And if the enemy laner tried to trade? Press E on them, press Q, walk away. And in her case, not only did she make the rest of her team unkillable with humongous heals, but she also amplified any other magic damage thanks to her Q shredding ridiculous amounts of MR. Oh, yeah, and she could save lanes globally.

Meanwhile, Karma, Sona, and Nami have never really been hit with the intention of bumping them out of solo lanes, they've just suffered from being good in duo lanes resulting in nerfs that impacted their potential in them. As it happens, they're also a lot less abusable by their player and a lot more abusable by their opponent in solo lanes, to the point where they just don't really bring enough to the table for competitive play.

tl;dr do actual research and stop mutilating dogs out sheer rage that isn't even justified. No, seriously, that's just cruel.
